data.title: Favorite Pizza Place
data.text: I live in Killeen so when I want pizza I always call or go online to Papa John's. They always provide me with exactly what I ask for.

data.title: Hometown diner still a local favorite
data.text: We have all visited this type of diner in our hometown where the waitstaff knows all the regular customers and what they drink, coffee, tea sweet or unsweetened. The burgers are nostalgic cooked just right. Daily specials for breakfast, lunch or dinner are the best choice and prices are still the best deal around. Seating can be a wait unless you don't mind sitting at a large table with others, which you will be made to feel welcome to the area. I would bet that many deals and conversations are worked out over the coffee that is poured to keep your cup topped off every few minutes.  Take a trip back to the old days with great food and friendly staff.

data.title: veg pizza.....and start up...
data.text:
being manager at  ECONOLODGE  KILLEEN  TX     they  offer discount  on large pizza
veg pizza  also  available    and   side  also....with discount price for drink

data.title: Pizza
data.text: The cheese pizza is good along with the buffalo hot wings.  It taste even better with extra sauce and spinach.

data.title: Papa John's on Duty
data.text: Every time I have 24 hours duty, this is the place I normally call so I can go pick it up and enjoy a great pizza.

data.title: Great pizza
data.text: Ordered while we were shopping and it was ready when we got there. It,  as usual, was delicious.  The worker was very friendly and enthusiastic.

data.title: Fast, Great, Inexpensive!
data.text: Great Pizza and Great Prices.  Good selection.  Always happy!  Fast Delivery!  And Yummy Deserts!  Very friendly delivery staff!

data.title: Great Pizza,
data.text: Fast and never cold when delivered to me!  I love the thin crust with one or both toppings. Just could not pass one by without buying two or three for the  road trip

data.title: My Little bros FAVORITE PLACE IN THE WORLD
data.text: My 18 yr old brother loves pizza and this is by far his favorite pizza joint. I myself would say that the Papa Johns located at 202 E. Vet Mem is the best out of three, including the PJ located near the Markte Heights Shopping Center, and the best of all the Pizza Places in Killeen. The employees are always friendly, the pizza is always cooked and ready on time, and lastly, I don't know his name, but there is an employee at the 202 location that is always friendly and funny even though he called me "Cherry" Love him!!!
